level.heading: BLIND VENDORS COMMITTEE[COLON] ORGANIZATION AND FUNCTIONS (ยง 29-213)

level.text: The Blind Vendors Committee shall be organized to include a coordinator, a vice-coordinator, and a secretary.
The Committee shall operate by meeting regularly with representatives of the Department, and shall operate as a whole and through subcommittees.
The Committee may decide, from time to time, to hold meetings of its own members only.
Between regular meetings, the Committee shall carry out functions through subcommittees, or individual members which the Committee designates for that purpose.
The Committee and the Department shall meet at least once a month.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: DCRR Title 6C, as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 27 DCR 4611 (October 17, 1980).
